properties.displayName: Suspicious FromBase64String Usage On Gzip Archive - Process Creation
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "FromBase64String" and ProcessCommandLine contains "MemoryStream" and ProcessCommandLine contains "H4sI"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects attempts of decoding a base64 Gzip archive via PowerShell. This technique is often used as a method to load malicious content into memory afterward.
